cause.description:
if there are enough stupid people to elect hillary clinton as president our country will go from a successful thriving country to a country in jeopardy of being a third-world country so do not elect hillary clinton president she is the worst canidate ever even worse than her husband and richard nixon
1. America doesn't need or want Hillary Clinton as a president
2. She needs to lose weight
3. Hopefully there aren't enough stupid people to elect her
cause.mission: stop hillary clinton from becoming president
cause.name: Stop Hillary Clinton... NOW!!!!!!
